title: Lovedol: Lovely Idol
alternative_title: Lovely Idol,  らぶドル～Lovely Idol～
description: Lovedol, or Lovely Idol, is a girl group consisting of two generations of idols. The 3rd Generation is about to make its debut, but to their surprise, they have been delayed! The vague reason is only that "they lack something." The manager, and the 3rd Gen. girls too, must find the answer.
